Translations.Text: I wid iweqmen, lewqama, ternuv as. Udmawen nnsen, ur ten ipnal bufsus, ne$ ddell. Widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs ad wekkoen
Aqeiii n wid id ibbwin tucmitin, d tucmip itent icban. Ad ndellen. Ur saun ameneul ar Oebbi. Amzun $ummen wudmawen nnsen, s ccevyat n yiv iberkanen. Widak d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
Ass ideg ara ten Nfesser akw, a Nini, imiren, i wid icurken: "imukan nnwen, kunwi akked icriken nnwen"! Sinna Nessemfaoaq iten. A d inin, icriken nnsen: "macci d nekwni ay taabdem
Ad Iqadd Oebbi, d Anagi garane$ yidwen, ar ur d neclia deg uabbed nnwen
Din, yal amdan ad iwali ayen iwasa. Ad u$alen ar Oebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

Ini: "anwa ikwen Ip$itin seg igenni akked tmurt? Anwa ay d Bab n tmejjin akked yieoi? Anwa id Issuffu$en amuddir si lmegget, id Issuffu$en lmegget seg umuddir? Anwa i Iseyyin lameo"? A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen n tidep. Deffir tidep, acu i illan, siwa ttelfan? Ihi, acimi texdaam
Akka i iuao wawal n Mass ik, $ef wid ixedmen tucmitin. Ih, nitni ur ppamnen
Ini: "day illa ger icriken nnwen, win id inzan lxelq, sinna, iules as d"? Ini: "Oebbi inezzu lxelq, sinna, Ippales as d. Ihi, amek ara twexxoem

Ini: "day illa, ger icriken nnwen, win i inehhun ar tidep"? Ini: "Oebbi Inehhu ar tidep. Win Inehhun ar tidep, day ur Yif ara, akken Iklal tikli yideS, win ur nennehhu, siwa ma ipwanha? Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepseyyim
Tegwti, segsen, teddun kan d nnwaya. Nnwaya, war ccekk, ur tebbwi acemma si tidep. Ih, Oebbi Issen acu xeddmen
Leqwoan agi ur d innulfa ara, war Oebbi. Maca, d atebbet n wayen it id izwaren, d afeuuel n Tezmamt, ur degs ccekk, s$uo Mass imavalen
Ne$ la qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed tasuoep i t icban, neccdet seg wanda tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii, skaddben ayen ur nekcim di tmusni nnsen, ur ten id iusi usefhem is. Akka ay skaddben, wid i ten id izwaren. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d imednas
Garasen, wid iumnen yis; garasen, wid ur numin yis. Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen ifessaden
Ma skaddben k, ini: "i nek igiten iw, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Ur teppkam deg wayen xedme$, ur ppka$ deg wayen txedmem
Garasen, llan wid i k issemeasen. Day tzemrev a pperrev ad slen iaeeeugen, ma llan ur fehhmen
Garasen, llan wid i k ipmuqulen. Day tzemrev a ppenhuv ider$alen, ma llan ur pwalin
Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iddennis imdanen, s wacemma, maca imdanen densen iman nnsen
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, amzun saaddan kan saaa n wass, ad msaaqalen. Ni$ xesoen wid iskaddben timlilit d Oebbi. Ur pwanhan
Ad ak Nessken kra seg wayen i sen Naahed, ne$ a k id Nawi $uone£. Ihi, $uone£ tu$alin nnsen. Sinna, Oebbi d Anagi n wayen xeddmen
I yal lois, amazan. Ma iusa d umazan nnsen, a ppefru garasen s lmizan, ur pwadensen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "ur mlike$ i iman iw vveoo, ne$ aba$uo, siwa ayen Ib$a Oebbi. Yal lois s lajel is". Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen s saaa, ur t id sseqoaben
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb iS, deg iv, ne$ deg wass? Acimi earen $uoeS ibe$wviyen
D$a, ma iusa d, a ppamnem yis? Tura, aql akwen t$eubem fellas
Sinna, ad asen inin i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n lebda. Ma teppuqeiian siwa kan $ef wayen tkeppbem
